title.rendered: 🐔 Chicken Inu Migration – Live AMA (24th March 2023)

content.rendered:
Chicken INU Migration – Community AMA
Recap 03/23/23
1. Chicken Inu has a partnership with Shiba Wings Restaurant (100%Confirmed).
2. Fuddoxx will be handling the contracts and marketing.
3. Yanyo will be the Managing Director of the project.
4. The restaurant (Shiba Wings) is the first restaurant in Australia that is 100% accepting crypto.
5. Wick also lives a very short distance to the restaurant so there is no issue with logistics.
6. We will be the native token for Shiba Wings for purchases of their products.
7. The liquidity will be strengthened to avoid volatility.
8. There will need to be a rebranding because of potential litigation over the Ticker #KFC
9. We will be migrating to a token Called (Wings of Shiba) with similar tokenomics. Small changes for expansion.
10. There will be a private and presale for the new ecosystem token.
11. The private sale – by sending your tokens to the wallet you will get 1:1+10% bonus above your current tokens.
12. Private available for you though it will be a smaller number of tokens and a longer vesting period. Vesting for
the private sale will be 4 months and after that time 25% will be released every two weeks till fully distributed.
13. Presale available for public presale vesting will be three months and after that 25% released every two weeks
until fully distributed.
14. W.O.S. will have 0% buy tax 0% transfer tax and 12%-15% sell tax.
15. Estimated launching MC 1mil
16. Whatever the MC was for Chicken when we start the sales say it’s 300K when we launch at 1mil MC you will
start with a 3X plus the ten% bonus tokens. Not a bad deal.
17. When you migrate you tokens that is what white lists you for the private sale.
18. The exact date of sales are still (To Be Determined), and will be given in plenty of time for you to be ready to
buy.
19. We are transitioning into a business token ecosystem and not just a meme token.
20. There will be franchises sold of the restaurant and we already have two parties ready to buy them.
21. Shiba wings has been open a week today and has already done $7,000.00 in token purchases.
22. Every franchise is required to purchase a determined amount of tokens to be used at their discretion for
promotional prizes and such.
23. The Liquidity will be very large ie: 50 – 100BNB or more to minimize volatility and protect both investors and
franchises owners.
24. So we already have two potential Dubai franchises and 5 Australia franchises which will increase token usage
and make Shiba Wings World Wide.
25. We will be building into the back end of the website to allow for an account to be created by regular consumers
to buy and use their tokens and they will have a barcode assigned to track their usages on both ends.
26. This will also provide a huge list of emails to market specials and discounts to increase revenue. Like TGI
Fridays does.
27. Normal crypto users will be able to log into their MM or trust wallet.
28. Nft’s will be available for utility/staking and perks like if you own this NFT you get a free drink or sandwich.
29. Marketing is going to be huge for restaurant and token at the same time.
30. We need to build our socials up to a minimum of say 20K subs to reach as many people as possible.
31. Most people will use the token for the savings and they may not even ever look at the chart.
32. There will be a second in command in the token named hobbes he and yanyo are in different time zones to
make coverage seemless.
33. CMC and CG have been applied for for chicken so we will get the pump from that and when we migrate we will
reapply as WOS and then get a pump from that listing as well.
34. The new token is being built right now to prepare for the pre and private sales.
35. There will be a huge tik tok and youtube presence in our marketing plans which will also bring in more revenue
and profit-sharing opportunities.
36. Travvladds kingpad was suggested for launch and will be discussed which could bring massive awareness as
well.
